Establishment of the Azerbaijan Democratic Republic was a historic event. For both our people and the world (cont) http://tl.gd/ao32qa
The importance of our people was that they have lived for centuries with a desire to be independent (cont) http://tl.gd/ao32vs
The world-wide significance was that for the first time in the world history, a democratic republic was established in the Muslim East.
The Azerbaijani state and the people of Azerbaijan have a great respect for the memory of the founders of the Azerbaijan Democratic Republic.
Today's independent Azerbaijan is the successor of the Democratic Republic of Azerbaijan.
I congratulate the people of Azerbaijan on the occasion of Independence Day - Republic Day, (cont) http://tl.gd/ao5npa
My well wishes go out to those participating in the ultimate human race, the #Comrades Marathon, tomorrow. You inspire us all!
Hello, good day! Here I am, expropriating parcels, lands and apt of Fogade, to transfer them to families in need. It's Justice!
Good evening. I have not been with you for quite a while. I will answer some questions that accumulate today.
Especially, there are many questions about internet. I want to remind you of a few things in this regard.
When these discussions started, I received detailed information from them by calling the TIB directors.
According to the information given to me, nobody is subjected to any force. No one's freedom is restricted.
The private sector will continue to offer its products in the same way. The public will also offer an alternative product for their own responsibility.
My view, basically, should not be a restriction of freedom. Everyone who wants to be able to walk freely on the internet.
On the other hand, let's not forget that the internet is a stormy ocean. Safe harbors should also be available for those who want to protect their ship.
Another issue is the situation of our contracted teachers and healthcare staff. I admit that there are serious strains.
But you also know that this is a topic with many different dimensions. I found that the government had reminded me, I will continue to find.
I have many followers who are curious about the movies I watch. Vision films are of course I am watching, but cinema is not just about vision and movies.
For example, on Sunday mornings I enjoy the classic Westerns broadcast in TRT and watch when I have the time.
A final note before saying goodbye: I pay special attention to not closing traffic in Istanbul or in Ankara, I am using helicopter or sea route.
The traffic congestion yesterday in Besiktas should not be related to us; because I went to Dolmabahçe from Tarabya by sea.

Today, Azerbaijan is a rapidly developing, dynamic, modern country. #Azerbaijan
This year, Azerbaijan's budget for the first time in history will exceed $ 20 billion as a result of the additions to our budget.
I am absolutely convinced that successful and sustainable development of Azerbaijan will be ensured in the coming years as well. #Azerbaijan
Great steps have been taken towards the development of democracy and new steps must be taken in this direction. #Azerbaijan
Democratic principles should be established in all spheres in Azerbaijan. #Azerbaijan
We are building a modern state. There is a state in which all democratic freedoms exist. We must strengthen these positive trends. #Azerbaijan
We will continue to fight corruption, bribery and unpleasant situations. #Azerbaijan
Additional measures will be taken to diversify the economy of our country. #Azerbaijan
The volume of investments made by the domestic and local entrepreneurs in the country's economy is increasing. #Azerbaijan
